Title: Coquilles
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Scott Nimerfro (teleplay by), Bryan Fuller (teleplay by), Scott Nimerfro (story by)
Actors: Hugh Dancy, Mads Mikkelsen, Caroline Dhavernas, Hettienne Park
Plot: A murdered couple is found in a motel room, posed in praying positions with the flesh of their backs opened and strung to the ceiling to give them the appearance of wings. Using hairs ...
